snippet.title: Besiege Console: out on PlayStation, Xbox and Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
Build siege engines, battle knights, demolish castles, and solve physics puzzles—all from the comfort of your couch!

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10002309
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/besiege-console/9PPFBQG81Q5J
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/besiege-switch

#Besiege #IndieGame #Console
